venue.name: Karuna Center for Massage & Healing, LLC

item.description:
This class will focus on poses for core strength to help develop better posture, balance and concentration. We’ll explore developing concentration through yoga “drishti” or focus and gaze. Each pose is modified for different levels, making this class suitable for beginners as well as practicing yogis. Class concludes with a few minutes of calming meditation and relaxation.

Mondays at 7:00-8:15 p.m.
Drop -in price $15.00. Series of $10 classes for $100.00
No expiration date!
Class size is limited, to reserve a space contact:
Grace Furnari (781) 267-6109 or sss1030@aol.com.

Yoga at the Karuna Center, 1 Walpole Street, Norwood, MA 02062 www.thekarunacenter.com
 

Come check out our new line of Aromatherapy Sprays..

Tranquility: A hand mixed blend of calming and relaxing Jasmine and Vanilla essentials oils

Peaceful Dreams: A hand mixed blend of warm and soothing vanilla and lavender essential oils

Calming Serenity: A hand mixed blend of calming lavender, warm vanilla and woodsy sandalwood oils

Stress Relief: A hand mixed blend of sweet rose and earthy patchouli oils to help bring relaxation to your day.

Summertime Bloom: A hand mixed blend of sweet rose and romantic ylang ylang essential oils.
item.how_to_find_us: First floor yoga and meditation room
item.name: Yoga for Core Strength and Balance
